name: Techyoob Web
description: Techyoob Web is single webpage portoflio application ( beta version ) for my engineering journey. It was built using React, CSS and SVG

name: US Elections in Motion
description: US Election in Motion is a project was built while tutoring a client for Reactjs, Nodejs and MongoDB. It uses historical data to render an animated colored map per state per winner party for all previous us elections.

name: BB Stock Screener
description: BB Stock Screener is full stack solution that sift through thousands of stocks in the U.S to identify patterns and behaviors in a fashion that helps individual investors to rationalize their emotional decisions.
